sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
loosens
ali
is loosened
, se odveže ali postane manj čvrsto pritrjeno na nekaj.

seg.quote: The tyre on one of his wheels had loosened.
The wind had loosened some leaves.

sense.def:
To loosen something
pomeni nekoliko sprostiti nekaj, kaj je privezano ali pritrjeno.

seg.quote: He took off his jacket and loosened his tie.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
loosens up
ali kadar nekaj
loosens someone up
, tista oseba postane mirnejša in manj zaskrbljena;

seg.quote: Her second drink loosened her up.
As the day wore on he loosened up and became more chatty.
